00011 import org.eclipse.m2m.atl.core.launch.ILauncher;

00013 import org.eclipse.m2m.atl.core.service.LauncherService;
00014 
00015 public class ATLrunner {
00016         
00017         protected ATLrunConfiguration config;
00018         
00019         public static void with(ATLrunConfiguration config) 
00020                 throws NullPointerException, ATLCoreException, IOException {
00021                 
00022                 ATLrunner runner = new ATLrunner();
00023                 runner.runWith(config);
00024         }
00025                 
00026         public void runWith(ATLrunConfiguration config) 
00027                 throws NullPointerException, ATLCoreException, IOException {
00028         
00029                 this.config = config;
00030                 
00031                 Map<String, String> paths                       = config.getPathsMap();
00032                 Map<String, String> inModels            = config.getInModelsIDMap();
00033                 Map<String, String> outModels           = config.getOutModelsIDMap();
00034                 Map<String, String> inoutModels         = config.getInOutModelsIDMap();
00035                 Map<String, Object> options             = new HashMap<String, Object>();
00036                 Map<String, String> modelHandlers       = config.defineModelHandlers();
00037                 Map<String, InputStream> libraries      = Collections.emptyMap();
00038                 
00039                 options.put(ATLLaunchConstants.OPTION_MODEL_HANDLER, modelHandlers);            
00040                 InputStream[] modules   = this.compiledTransformations(); 
00041                 ILauncher atlVM                 = this.initializeATLVM();
00042 
00043                 LauncherService.launch("run", null, atlVM, inModels, inoutModels,
00044                                 outModels, paths, options, libraries, modules);
00045         }
00046 
00047 
00048         protected InputStream[] compiledTransformations() throws IOException {
00049                 InputStream[] modules = new InputStream[1];
00050                 modules[0] = config.getCompiledTransformationAsStream();
00051                 return modules;
00052         }
00053 
00054         protected ILauncher initializeATLVM() throws NullPointerException, ATLCoreException {
00055                 ILauncher atlVM = CoreService.getLauncher("EMF-specific VM");
00056                 if (atlVM == null) {
00057                         throw new NullPointerException("Could NOT get an EMF ATL-VM!");
00058                 }
00059                 return atlVM;
00060         }
